column4: I'm still getting "The file/boot/grub/stage1 not read correctly errors", please help!
I don't think i moved partitions?
if I do find /boot/grub/stage1 its there.
then you might have a flaky harddrive
then mount your ubuntu hd-partition and copy /boot/grub/directory over _EXCEPT_ _the_ _menu.lst_
where would I copy it to?
How else would I be accessing it!
